entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Oxtongue Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:13 a.m. EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Freezing rain or rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or ice pellets changing to periods of rain this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Local rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Temperature rising to 8 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Showers ending before morning then cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening and after midnight. Local amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Temperature rising to 8 this evening then falling. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
